forum.name: guide
forum.description: the anyland guide with faq, frequently asked questions and their answers! help along, wiki style!

thread.title: screenshots

comments.text: you can make a photo of what you're currently seeing by clicking the trigger + menu button on your controller simultaneously.
later, steam will ask you which screenshots you want to upload & share.
uploaded screenshots can then also be pasted into comments. copy the image url from steam, e.g. [steamimage: 942811548908498573/C921573A403A563A185881942DF6E60832248539/]
you can also paste screenshot or artwork urls onto thing parts as textures. see the "copy & paste" button when context-lasering a part while creating.
you can also share your screenshots in the [board: showcase]

thread.latestCommentText: you can also share your screenshots in the [board showcase]
